en.title: What Is a Neva Masquerade? A Guide to the Siberian's Color Point Variety
en.content:
The Neva Masquerade is the color point variation of the Siberian. Named after Russia's Neva River, it is characterized by beautiful markings on the face that resemble a masquerade mask.

Characteristics of the Neva Masquerade

Color Point Pattern and Blue Eyes

The most distinctive feature of the Neva Masquerade is its Siamese-like color point pattern and blue eyes. Most of the body is a light cream to white, with darker color on the face, ears, paws, and tip of the tail. This beautiful contrast is what makes the Neva Masquerade so captivating.

Types of Point Colors

The Neva Masquerade comes in several color variations: seal point (dark brown), blue point (gray-blue), red point, cream point, and tabby point (lynx point).

Is the Personality the Same as a Regular Siberian?

Yes, the Neva Masquerade has the same personality as a regular Siberian. They are gentle, intelligent, and loyal to their owners with a "dog-like" personality. Since personality differences based on coat color have not been scientifically proven, there is no need to worry about temperament.

Neva Masquerade Kittens

Neva Masquerade kittens are born almost entirely white. The point colors gradually appear as they grow. It can take several months to a year for the colors to fully stabilize, and watching this transformation is one of the delights of owning this variety.

Low-Allergen Characteristics

As a type of Siberian, the Neva Masquerade is also believed to possess low-allergen characteristics. It is a breed worth considering even for those concerned about cat allergies.

zh.title: 涅瓦假面舞会猫是什么？详解西伯利亚猫的重点色品种
zh.content:
涅瓦假面舞会（Neva Masquerade）是西伯利亚猫的重点色变种。以俄罗斯的涅瓦河命名，其面部花纹宛如佩戴了假面舞会面具，极具特色。

涅瓦假面舞会猫的特征

重点色花纹与蓝色眼睛

涅瓦假面舞会猫最大的特征是类似暹罗猫的重点色花纹和蓝色眼睛。身体大部分为浅奶油色至白色，面部、耳朵、四肢和尾巴末端呈深色。这种美丽的对比正是涅瓦假面舞会猫的魅力所在。

重点色的种类

涅瓦假面舞会猫有多种颜色变体：海豹色重点（深棕色）、蓝色重点（灰蓝色）、红色重点、奶油色重点，以及虎斑重点（山猫重点）。

性格和普通西伯利亚猫一样吗？

是的，涅瓦假面舞会猫的性格与普通西伯利亚猫相同。温和聪慧，对主人忠诚，具有“像狗一样”的性格。由于毛色导致的性格差异在科学上尚未得到证实，因此无需担心性格方面的问题。

涅瓦假面舞会猫的幼猫

涅瓦假面舞会猫的幼猫出生时几乎全身雪白。随着成长，重点色会逐渐显现。颜色完全稳定可能需要数月至一年时间，欣赏这种变化过程也是饲养的一大乐趣。

低致敏特性

作为西伯利亚猫的一种，涅瓦假面舞会猫也被认为具有低致敏特性。即使担心猫过敏，也值得考虑的猫种。
